definition:
A RobotBody with human-like morphology (torso, head, arms, legs),
   designed to operate in environments built for humans.

positive_examples: This is an example of humanoid robot.
The humanoid robot demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed humanoid robot in this context.
A typical case of humanoid robot would involve these features.
The concept of humanoid robot applies here.
A robot with a body shape built to resemble the human body with head, torso, arms, and legs.
negative_examples: This is an example of autonomous mobile robot, not humanoid robot.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AutonomousMobileRobot, or other types of Robot
